head.title: Weinre
head.intro: [weinre](https://www.npmjs.com/package/weinre) is a remote Web inspector. Note that it has been deprecated since 2016.

body.title: Usage
body.elms:
#### Install:

```
$ npm install -g weinre
```

#### Start the server:

```
$ weinre --boundHost 0.0.0.0
$ open http://localhost:8080
```
